text: updating an ml model in production
typically involves offline testing using
historical inference request data
however historical test data often fails
to account for current real world
conditions which can lead to undetected
errors that negatively impact customer
experience but with Amazon's sagemaker
Shadow testing you can test new ml
models against production models using
live data that accounts for current real
world conditions sagemaker Shadow
testing helps you catch configuration
errors before they impact end users
sagemaker eliminates the need to build
testing infrastructure allowing you to
test models in days instead of weeks
just select the production model you
wish to test against and sagemaker
automatically deploys the new model
alongside the production model
duplicates the live inference requests
and routes a copy to the shadow model
sagemaker provides a live dashboard that
displays side by side real-time
comparisons of model performance metrics
such as latency and error rate the
dashboard lets you quickly review the
test results to validate the new model
Shadow testing has never been simpler
give it a try
